quadratix.stats

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • quadratix.stats.Counter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Counter
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class might be the most scientific component of this project. It carries the huge responsibility to count. Count what? Well, that's up to you! It can count anything! But with determination! And guess what? It's thread-safe!
    See Also:
